description: This 6'3? slab of rippling muscle is just so damn hot, it almost hurts to look at him without turning into a mass of quivering jelly that wants to do nothing more then lick every inch of this smoldering Adonis, starting with that face that belongs on top of a marble statue, over those hard nipples, across those massive pecs and down to a set of abs that can cause traffic to stop. title: King Of Hards, Scene #02
